nl.label: omdat
nl.note: 'omdat' is a subordinating conjunction, followed by a clause in inverted order: subject-object-verb. For example, 'Ik ga naar huis omdat ik moe ben'

nl.label: want
nl.note: 'want' is a coordinating conjunction, followed by a clause in normal subject-verb-object order. For example, 'Ik ga naar huis want ik ben moe'
